cast.name: 阿彼察邦·韦拉斯哈古 Apichatpong Weerasethakul
佩德罗·科斯塔 Pedro Costa
曼努埃尔·德·奥利维拉 Manoel de Oliveira

introduction: Apichatpong Weerasethakul, Pedro Costa, Manoel de Oliveira, Luís Miñarro, and I, with our diverse gazes, we undertake this "Uncertain Journey", wandering around the threshold where life and cinema intertwine. Facing –as a citizen and as a filmmaker– the identity crisis that floods Europe, I look backwards in search for lights of hope, and I admire how my daughter Alicia, at the age of 4, stares happily at the clouds somewhere in La Mancha, in a place whose name I do care to remember: Fuente Álamo.Pablo García Pérez de Lara
